Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kolmar
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via: Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Dvision, due to, street blockage, near Division/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Dvision, due to, street blockage, near Division/Kolmar.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Chicago
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red  Line trains are standing at Chicago due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red  Line trains are standing at Chicago due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
